article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for GSI C
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT5.2
section.para: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT5.2.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT5.0
section.para: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT5.0.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT4.2
section.para: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT4.2.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT4.0
section.para: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT4.0.

section.title: Migrating from GT3
section.para: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT3.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT2
section.para: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT2.
